alert.note: Alert for Etowah (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 18 at 3:42PM CDT until May 18 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following counties, Calhoun and Etowah. * WHEN...Until 645 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 342 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Rainbow City, Glencoe, Ohatchee, Neely Henry Lake, Southside, Cobb City and Wellington.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
